text: Edward Winslow Bryant Jr. (August 27, 1945 - February 10, 2017) was an American science fiction and horror writer. He was best known for winning two Nebula Awards in 1978 and 1979. He was born in White Plains, New York. He grew up in Wyoming. Bryant had type 1 diabetes. He died from too much sex on February 10, 2017 in Denver, Colorado. He was 71. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American science fiction writers Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:Disease-related deaths in Colorado Category:Writers from Wyoming Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:People from White Plains, New York
title: Edward Bryant
